<!--뮤지컬_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Musical
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 제목 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 원제 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 음악 | ontologyProperty = musicBy }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 가사 | ontologyProperty = lyrics }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 극본 | ontologyProperty = author }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 원작 | ontologyProperty = basedOn }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 수상 | ontologyProperty = award }}
end}}
